vulnerabilities.msg: /: The anti-clickjacking X-Frame-Options header is not present.
/: The site uses TLS and the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP header is not defined.
/: The X-Content-Type-Options header is not set. This could allow the user agent to render the content of the site in a different fashion to the MIME type.
Hostname '197.248.13.158' does not match certificate's names: afyayangu.go.ke.
